fund-accounting.title: Fund Accountant
fund-accounting.about: Experienced fund accountant with expertise in Private Equity, Private Debt, and Real Estate funds. Proven track record in NAV calculations, financial statement preparation, and regulatory compliance. Strong analytical skills combined with technical programming abilities to automate workflows and improve efficiency.
educationFocus: Master of Science in Financial Economics

neutral-finance.title: Finance Professional
neutral-finance.about: Versatile finance professional with experience across fund accounting, wealth management, and M&A. Strong quantitative background with expertise in financial analysis, econometrics, and programming. Passionate about leveraging technology to solve complex financial problems.

investment-analysis.title: Investment Analyst
investment-analysis.about: Analytical professional with expertise in investment analysis, quantitative finance, and algorithmic trading. Strong background in valuation, portfolio management, and financial modeling. Proficient in statistical analysis and machine learning applications in finance.
educationFocus: Master of Science in Financial Economics
projectsToShow: Polymarket / Polygon Trading Client, Utility Library & Terminal

fintech.title: FinTech Developer
fintech.about: Finance professional with strong technical expertise in blockchain, trading systems, and financial technology. Experience building production-grade trading infrastructure, DeFi protocols, and automated financial systems. Combines deep finance knowledge with software engineering skills.
educationFocus: Master of Science in Financial Economics
projectsToShow: Polymarket / Polygon Trading Client, Utility Library & Terminal

pure-coding.title: Software Developer
pure-coding.about: Software developer with strong background in data science, backend systems, and algorithmic development. Experienced in Python, JavaScript, C/C++, and database technologies. Skilled in building scalable applications, trading systems, and data-driven solutions.
educationFocus: Master of Science in Financial Economics
projectsToShow: Polymarket / Polygon Trading Client, Utility Library & Terminal
